snippet.title: History of the Hunter's railways | photos
snippet.content:
History of the Hunter's railways | photos
exit
In 2016 works on the former Newcastle rail corridor uncovered . A year on and the old brickwork, that was part of the historic former Honeysuckle railway station, could be incorporated into the design of Newcastle's new light rail.
The material will be excavated, stored in a secure location and assessed for possible incorporation into the urban design elements of the light rail project.
The news has inspired a trip down memory lane to look at the Hunter's historical railway lines.
Take a look through the Fairfax archives at the history of the Hunter's railway lines in pictures.
